All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
Class to handle the commands based on airlift order
Airlift
Class to handle the airlift command based order.
AllTheConstants
Constants of the file which should be initialized during the runtime of the Game.
Blockade
Class to handle the blockade command based order.
Bomb
Class to handle the bomb command based order.
Card
Class describes the Cards available to Players, though its a subclass of the Order Its parent to all the card based classes i.e airlift,blockade, bomb, negotiate
Command
Utility class to handle the Command received from players.
Continent
Class to handle the features related to continent as well its data members
Country
Country model class, which contains features and data members related to a country.
Deploy
Class used to handle deploy based orders
GameEngine
Entry point of the game.
GameState
Common data structure of the game , contains the state of the game.
InvalidCommand
Exception class created to handle validity of the command based exception.
InvalidState
Exception class created to handle all the invalid scenarios related to the state of the game.
IssueOrderPhase
This class handles the issue order phase of the GAME.
IssueOrderPhaseTest
 
JUnitTestSuite
 
LogEntryBuffer
Observable of our OBSERVER PATTERN.
LogLevel
This is ENUM to contain the Level of the Log available to player.
LogWriter
Log writer class basically defines an observer which is subscribed to an Observable Follows the OBSERVER PATTERN design
Main
A main class to signify the starting of the game.
Map
This class is used to Manage a Map
MapInvalidException
Exception class created to handle validity of the Map Based Invalid Conditions.
MapTest
 
MapView
This is the MapView Class.
Negotiate
Class to handle the Negotiate command based order.
Order
Order interface to handle variety of Orders which can be executed in the game.
OrderExecutionPhase
This class describes the Order Execution STATE of the game.
OrderExecutionPhaseTest
 
Phase
Handles the state of the Game, using various phases.
Player
Player class handles the properties related a Player of the game and provide the features to change those properties.
PlayerController
Class to keep the global operation required on players to be kept at one single location
StartUpPhase
Class denotes the start up phase STATE of the game
StartUpPhaseTest
